amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-158 to cut the $73 million increase in funding for the NATO Security Investment Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the NATO Security Investment Program by $73,334,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 347 (Roll no. 371).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Greene (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 347 (Roll no. 371).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
